welcome_message_body: Welcome to El Pueblito, Mexico! Get ready to be charmed by our quaint streets, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Tacos y Tamales Toña
restaurants.description: Tacos y Tamales Toña is a taco restaurant located in Corregidora.
restaurants.address: Isidro Hernández 13 (El Pueblito), 76900 Corregidora, Querétaro de Arteaga
